text: Ingaba imbali yabo bangaphambili kunabo ayizanga ifike na kubo? Abantu bakwa Nûh, abakwa’Ad, nabakwaThamûd, abantu bakwaIbrâhîm nabemi bakwaMidiyani nabezixeko ezagqunyelelwayo; kuzo kwafika abaProfeti babo nemiqondiso ecacileyo. AyingoAllâh ke Owabenza ububi, koko ngabo ngokwabo abazenza ububi
